verses.verse: בָּרֲכִ֥י <WH1288> ba-ra-Chi Bless נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> naf-Shi, O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> 'E-lo-hai my God גָּדַ֣לְתָּ <WH1431> ga-Dal-ta great מְּאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; thou art very ה֭וֹד <WH1935> Hod with honour וְהָדָ֣ר <WH1926> ve-ha-Dar and majesty לָבָֽשְׁתָּ׃ <WH3847> la-Va-she-ta. thou art clothed

עֹֽטֶה־ <WH5844> 'o-teh- Who coverest א֭וֹר <WH216> or [thyself] with light כַּשַּׂלְמָ֑ה <WH8008> kas-sal-Mah; as [with] a garment נוֹטֶ֥ה <WH5186> no-Teh who stretchest out שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> Ma-yim, the heavens כַּיְרִיעָֽה׃ <WH3407> kay-ri-'Ah. like a curtain

הַ֥מְקָרֶֽה <WH7136> Ham-ka-reh Who layeth the beams בַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> vam-Ma-yim, in the waters עֲ‍ ֽלִיּ֫וֹתָ֥יו <WH5944> ali-Yo-Tav of his chambers הַשָּׂם־ <WH7760> has-som- who maketh עָבִ֥ים <WH5645> 'a-Vim the clouds רְכוּב֑וֹ <WH7398> re-chu-Vo; his chariot הַֽ֝מְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <WH1980> ham-hal-Lech, who walketh עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon כַּנְפֵי־ <WH3671> kan-fei- upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> Ru-ach. of the wind

עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh Who maketh מַלְאָכָ֣יו <WH4397> mal-'a-Chav his angels רוּח֑וֹת <WH7307> ru-Chot; spirits מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <WH8334> me-sha-re-Tav, his ministers אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh fire לֹהֵֽט׃ <WH3857> lo-Het. a flaming

יָֽסַד־ <WH3254> ya-sad- add אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz of the earth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon מְכוֹנֶ֑יהָ <WH4349> me-cho-Nei-ha; the foundations בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- that it will not תִּ֝מּ֗וֹט <WH4131> tim-Mot, [that] it should not be removed עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> o-Lam forever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> va-'Ed. and ever

תְּ֭הוֹם <WH8415> Te-hom it with the deep כַּלְּב֣וּשׁ <WH3830> kal-le-Vush as [with] a garment כִּסִּית֑וֹ <WH3680> kis-si-To; Thou coveredst עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above הָ֝רִ֗ים <WH2022> ha-Rim, above the mountains יַֽעַמְדוּ־ <WH5975> ya-'am-du- stood מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. the waters

מִן־ <WH4480> min- At גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <WH1606> ga-'a-Ra-te-cha thy rebuke יְנוּס֑וּן <WH5127> ye-nu-Sun; they fled מִן־ <WH4480> min- At ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol at the voice רַֽ֝עַמְךָ֗ <WH7482> ra-'am-cha, of thy thunder יֵחָפֵזֽוּן׃ <WH2648> ye-cha-fe-Zun. they hasted

יַעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> ya-'a-Lu They go up הָ֭רִים <WH2022> Ha-rim by the mountains יֵרְד֣וּ <WH3381> ye-re-Du they go down בְקָע֑וֹת <WH1237> ve-ka-'ot; by the valleys אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מְ֝ק֗וֹם <WH4725> me-Kom, unto the place זֶ֤ה׀ <WH2088> zeh which יָסַ֬דְתָּ <WH3245> ya-Sad-ta thou hast founded לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> la-Hem. like

גְּֽבוּל־ <WH1366> ge-vu-l-Sa- a bound שַׂ֭מְתָּ <WH7760> me-ta Thou hast set בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- may not יַֽעֲבֹר֑וּן <WH5674> ya-'a-vo-Run; that they may not pass over בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- they will not יְ֝שׁוּב֗וּן <WH7725> ye-shu-Vun, that they turn not again לְכַסּ֥וֹת <WH3680> le-chas-Sot to cover הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the earth

הַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <WH7971> ham-shal-Le-ach He sendeth מַ֭עְיָנִים <WH4599> Ma'-ya-nim the springs בַּנְּחָלִ֑ים <WH5158> ban-ne-cha-Lim; into the valleys בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between הָ֝רִ֗ים <WH2022> ha-Rim, among the hills יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <WH1980> ye-hal-le-Chun. [which] run

יַ֭שְׁקוּ <WH8248> Yash-ku They give drink כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- to every חַיְת֣וֹ <WH2416> chay-To to every beast שָׂדָ֑י <WH7704> sa-Dai; of the field יִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <WH7665> yish-be-Ru quench פְרָאִ֣ים <WH6501> fe-ra-'Im the wild asses צְמָאָֽם׃ <WH6772> tze-ma-'Am. their thirst

עֲ֭לֵיהֶם <WH5921> 'A-lei-hem Beside עוֹף־ <WH5775> 'of- By them shall the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the heaven יִשְׁכּ֑וֹן <WH7931> yish-Kon; have their habitation מִבֵּ֥ין <WH996> mib-Bein among עֳ֝פָאיִ֗ם <WH6073> 'o-fa-Yim, the branches יִתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> yit-te-nu- lift קֽוֹל׃ <WH6963> Kol. up voices

מַשְׁקֶ֣ה <WH8248> mash-Keh He watereth הָ֭רִים <WH2022> Ha-rim the hills מֵעֲלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <WH5944> me-'a-li-yo-Tav; from his chambers מִפְּרִ֥י <WH6529> mip-pe-Ri with the fruit מַ֝עֲשֶׂ֗יךָ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-cha, of thy works תִּשְׂבַּ֥ע <WH7646> tis-Ba' is satisfied הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the earth

מַצְמִ֤יחַ <WH6779> matz-Mi-ach to grow חָצִ֨יר׀ <WH2682> cha-Tzir He causeth the grass לַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> lab-be-he-Mah, for the cattle וְ֭עֵשֶׂב <WH6212> Ve-'e-sev and herb לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service הָאָדָ֑ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam; of man לְה֥וֹצִיא <WH3318> le-Ho-tzi that he may bring forth לֶ֝֗חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem, food מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. out of the earth

וְיַ֤יִן׀ <WH3196> ve-Ya-yin And wine יְשַׂמַּ֬ח <WH8055> ye-sam-Mach [that] maketh glad לְֽבַב־ <WH3824> le-vav- the heart אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh, of man לְהַצְהִ֣יל <WH6670> le-hatz-Hil to shine פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> pa-Nim to make [his] face מִשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> mish-Sha-men; [and] oil וְ֝לֶ֗חֶם <WH3899> ve-Le-chem, and bread לְֽבַב־ <WH3824> le-vav- heart אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh man's יִסְעָֽד׃ <WH5582> yis-'Ad. [which] strengtheneth

יִ֭שְׂבְּעוּ <WH7646> Yis-be-'u are full עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei The trees יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD אַֽרְזֵ֥י <WH730> 'ar-Zei [of sap] the cedars לְ֝בָנ֗וֹן <WH3844> le-va-Non, of Lebanon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָטָֽע׃ <WH5193> na-Ta'. which he hath planted

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-she-ro-Sha- after שָׁ֭ם <WH8033> m in it צִפֳּרִ֣ים <WH6833> tzip-po-Rim Where the birds יְקַנֵּ֑נוּ <WH7077> ye-kan-Ne-nu; make their nests חֲ֝סִידָ֗ה <WH2624> cha-si-Dah, [as for] the stork בְּרוֹשִׁ֥ים <WH1265> be-ro-Shim the fir trees בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <WH1004> bei-Tah. [are] her house

הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> ha-Rim hills הַ֭גְּבֹהִים <WH1364> Hag-ge-vo-him The high לַיְּעֵלִ֑ים <WH3277> lai-ye-'e-Lim; for the wild goats סְ֝לָעִ֗ים <WH5553> se-la-'Im, [and] the rocks מַחְסֶ֥ה <WH4268> mach-Seh [are] a refuge לַֽשְׁפַנִּֽים׃ <WH8227> Lash-fan-Nim. for the conies

עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah He appointed יָ֭רֵחַ <WH3394> Ya-re-ach the moon לְמוֹעֲדִ֑ים <WH4150> le-mo-'a-Dim; for seasons שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> mesh the sun יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> ya-Da' knoweth מְבוֹאֽוֹ׃ <WH3996> me-vo-'O. his going down

תָּֽשֶׁת־ <WH7896> ta-shet- Thou makest חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech darkness וִ֣יהִי <WH1961> Vi-hi becomes לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> La-ye-lah; and it is night בּֽוֹ־ bov- תִ֝רְמֹ֗שׂ <WH7430> tir-Mos, do creep כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חַיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> chay-tov- wherein all the beasts יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> Ya-'ar. of the forest

הַ֭כְּפִירִים <WH3715> Hak-ke-fi-rim The young lions שֹׁאֲגִ֣ים <WH7580> sho-'a-Gim roar לַטָּ֑רֶף <WH2964> lat-Ta-ref; after their prey וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> u-le-vak-Kesh and seek מֵאֵ֣ל <WH410> me-'El from God אָכְלָֽם׃ <WH400> 'a-che-Lam. their meat

תִּזְרַ֣ח <WH2224> tiz-Rach ariseth הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <WH8121> Hash-she-mesh The sun יֵאָסֵפ֑וּן <WH622> ye-'a-se-Fun; they gather themselves together וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- in מְ֝עוֹנֹתָ֗ם <WH4585> me-'o-no-Tam, in their dens יִרְבָּצֽוּן׃ <WH7257> yir-ba-Tzun. and lay them down

יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> ye-Tze goeth forth אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam Man לְפָעֳל֑וֹ <WH6467> le-fo-'o-Lo; unto his work וְֽלַעֲבֹ֖דָת֣וֹ <WH5656> ve-la-'a-Vo-da-To and to his labour עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> 'a-dei- eternity עָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> 'A-rev. until the evening

מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- how רַבּ֬וּ <WH7231> rab-Bu how manifold מַעֲשֶׂ֨יךָ׀ <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei-cha are thy works יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD כֻּ֭לָּם <WH3605> Kul-lom all בְּחָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> be-cha-che-Mah in wisdom עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta; hast thou made מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> mal-'Ah is full הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, them all the earth קִנְיָנֶֽךָ׃ <WH7075> kin-ya-Ne-cha. of thy riches

זֶ֤ה׀ <WH2088> zeh There הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> hai-Yam sea גָּדוֹל֮ <WH1419> ga-dOl [So is] this great וּרְחַ֪ב <WH7342> u-re-Chav and broad יָ֫דָ֥יִם <WH3027> ya-Da-yim In שָֽׁם־ <WH8033> sham- which רֶ֭מֶשׂ <WH7431> Re-mes wherein [are] things creeping וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein without מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> mis-Par; innumerable חַיּ֥וֹת <WH2416> chai-Yot beasts קְ֝טַנּ֗וֹת <WH6996> ke-tan-Not, both small עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH1419> ge-do-Lot. and great

שָׁ֭ם <WH8033> m There אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> o-ni-Yot the ships יְהַלֵּכ֑וּן <WH1980> ye-hal-le-Chun; There go לִ֝וְיָתָ֗ן <WH3882> liv-ya-Tan, [there is] that leviathan זֶֽה־ <WH2088> zeh- which יָצַ֥רְתָּ <WH3335> ya-Tzar-ta [whom] thou hast made לְשַֽׂחֶק־ <WH7832> le-sa-chek- to play בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

כֻּ֭לָּם <WH3605> Kul-lom all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha about יְשַׂבֵּר֑וּן <WH7663> ye-sab-be-Run; These wait לָתֵ֖ת <WH5414> la-Tet all upon thee that thou mayest give אָכְלָ֣ם <WH400> 'a-che-Lam [them] their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6256> be-'it-To. in due season

תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> tit-Ten [That] thou givest לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> La-hem they יִלְקֹט֑וּן <WH3950> yil-ko-Tun; them they gather תִּפְתַּ֥ח <WH6605> tif-Tach thou openest יָֽ֝דְךָ֗ <WH3027> ya-de-cha, thine hand יִשְׂבְּע֥וּן <WH7646> yis-be-'Un they are filled טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> Tov. with good

תַּסְתִּ֥יר <WH5641> tas-Tir Thou hidest פָּנֶיךָ֮ <WH6440> pa-nei-Cha thy face יִֽבָּהֵ֫ל֥וּן <WH926> yib-ba-He-Lun they are troubled תֹּסֵ֣ף <WH622> to-Sef thou takest away ר֭וּחָם <WH7307> Ru-chom their breath יִגְוָע֑וּן <WH1478> yig-va-'Un; they die וְֽאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to עֲפָרָ֥ם <WH6083> 'a-fa-Ram to their dust יְשׁוּבֽוּן׃ <WH7725> ye-shu-Vun. and return

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> te-shal-Lach Thou sendest ר֭וּחֲךָ <WH7307> Ru-cha-cha forth thy spirit יִבָּרֵא֑וּן <WH1254> yib-ba-re-'Un; they are created וּ֝תְחַדֵּ֗שׁ <WH2318> u-te-chad-Desh, and thou renewest פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei the face אֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> 'a-da-Mah. of the earth

יְהִ֤י <WH1961> ye-Hi endure כְב֣וֹד <WH3519> che-Vod The glory יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; shall endure for ever יִשְׂמַ֖ח <WH8055> yis-Mach shall rejoice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּמַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <WH4639> be-ma-'a-Sav. in his works

הַמַּבִּ֣יט <WH5027> ham-mab-Bit He looketh לָ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> La-'a-retz on the earth וַתִּרְעָ֑ד <WH7460> vat-tir-'Ad; and it trembleth יִגַּ֖ע <WH5060> yig-Ga' he toucheth בֶּהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> be-ha-Rim the hills וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ <WH6225> Ve-ye-'e-Sha-nu. and they smoke

אָשִׁ֣ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah I will sing לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD בְּחַיָּ֑י <WH2416> be-chai-Yai; as long as I live אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <WH2167> 'a-zam-me-Rah I will sing לֵאלֹהַ֣י <WH430> le-lo-Hai praise to my God בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ <WH5750> be-'o-Di. while I have my being

יֶעֱרַ֣ב <WH6149> ye-'e-Rav of him shall be sweet עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and שִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> si-Chi; My meditation אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi, I אֶשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> 'es-Mach I will be glad בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. in the LORD

יִתַּ֤מּוּ <WH8552> yit-Tam-mu be consumed חַטָּאִ֨ים׀ <WH2400> chat-ta-'Im Let the sinners מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz out of the earth וּרְשָׁעִ֤ים׀ <WH7563> u-re-sha-'Im and let the wicked ע֤וֹד <WH5750> od more אֵינָ֗ם <WH369> 'ei-Nam, be no בָּרֲכִ֣י <WH1288> ba-ra-Chi be no more Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> Naf-shi O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh thou the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
